text: Thomas "Tom" M. Frost (June 30, 1936 â€“ August 24, 2018) was an American rock climber. He was known for big wall climbing first ascents in Yosemite Valley. He was also a photographer and climbing equipment maker. Frost died on August 24, 2018 at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Interview with Frost by John Martin Meek at the AAC Annual Meeting on September 13, 1999 * Interview with Frost on climbing.com Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American photographers Category:American mountain climbers
title: Tom Frost
